description.en: Jin-Wei Chang received the B.S. degree in computer science from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Yuan Ze University. He is currently studying for the M.S. degree in computer science at the Department of Computer Science, National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University. His research interests include emerging memory and storage technologies.
description.zh-tw: 張晉瑋，2024年於國立陽明交通大學資訊科學與工程研究所取得碩士學位，2018年於元智大學資訊工程學系取得學士學位。研究興趣包含嵌入式系統、邊緣人工智慧、新興記憶體技術。

name.default: National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University

department.zh-tw: 資訊科學與工程研究所

journal.author: Jin-Wei Chang and Tseng-Yi Chen
journal.title: When B+-tree Meets Skyrmion Memory: How Skyrmion Memory Affects an Indexing Scheme
journal.publication: IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems (TCAD), vol. 41, no. 11, pp. 3814-3825

conference.author: Jin-Wei Chang and Tseng-Yi Chen
conference.title: When B+-tree Meets Skyrmion Memory: How Skyrmion Memory Affects an Indexing Scheme

work.default: 於斯格明子賽道記憶體技術上優化B+樹索引架構
Looking for a Gentleman in Flowers - Orchid Species Identification and Classification
work.zh-tw: 尋找花中君子-蘭花種類辨識與分類競賽

work.default: Problem F - Verilog Simulation Optimization via Instruction Reduction

programming.title: Skyrmion Racetrace Memory on B+ Tree Simulator
programming.description: Simulate the behaviors on B+ tree indexing scheme of the advanced memory material, skyrmion racetrack memory, and collect the memory operations to analyze the energy consumption and latency with different algorithms.

programming.title: Verilog Simulation Optimization via Instruction Reduction
programming.description: Reduce code size of verilog files and keep the input and output logic with same logic effect.
